articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves to Visit European Countries 
   Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Vice Department Director of its Central Committee Kim Thae Jong left here Tuesday to visit Germany, Belgium, Luxemburg and Greece.
